summary: Use nano-technology to cure diseases and poison.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] introduction [/b]
This is a device that injects nanites into your blood to control sickness and poisons. Cure disease potions are the rarest things in Skyrim? Use as a spell. Craft the injection unit at the forge under MISC. It is called stimpack. Then "read" it under books in your inventory.

[b] install [/b]
Use NMM of Mod Organizer. Manual is just drop the .esp and .bsa in your data folder.

[b] credits [/b]
Bethesda for the great game and stuff
Nexus for the stellar community and hosting the party
3DS Max
gimp
NifSkope
MurdermiesteR (me) [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR
